Name: Destroying The Asteroids (Along With Unfair Hurdles)
About the game: * There are 2 Asteroids in this Game. For Destroying each of the Asteroids, You have to go through many Hurdles like mazes, droppers, spinners, etc. * Collide with any hurdles before the 1st Asteroid will result in respawning You at Starting Point. * Collide with any hurdles after the 1st Asteroid and Before the 2nd Asteroid will result in respawning You at the 2nd Point (Where You had destroyed the 1st Asteroid). * Find the Asteroid and Destroy it by Colliding with it (only Asteroid). * The Game will Complete when You Destroy both the Asteroids. Good Luck :) * WASD Keys or Arrow Keys are for Player Movements (No Need of the Mouse for Movement of the Player in this Game) * It is advisable that please don't go for Speedrun of this Game at Start. Please complete the Game and practice it and then it will be easy to go for Speedrun Note:- Back to Main Menu button is not a Pause button If You Complete the Game and want to take Screenshot of it then take it within 2.5 seconds (or press F12) There is no continue, or save & load game option in it. You Can Complete this Game in one go.
